cast.overview: In a struggling post-Soviet community, Lilya a teenage girl is abandoned when her mother moves to the United States with her boyfriend. Facing neglect and poverty, she meets Andrei, who offers her a job in Sweden, giving her hope for a better life — and a journey that will change everything.
cast.title: Lilya 4-ever

details.biography:
Pavel Ponomarev (Russian: Павел Пономарёв; born January 30, 1980 in Leningrad) is a Russian actor and musician living in Estonia.

Pavel Ponomarev has acted in the musicals "Abandoned" and "Miss Saigon" and in the film "Lilja 4-ever". He graduated from the Georg Ots School of Music with a degree in pop-jazz singing. From 2002 to 2006 he sang in the rockabilly band Wild Ones. Since 2013, he has been the soloist in the 70-80 cover band VIA Baltika.
details.name: Pavel Ponomaryov
details.place_of_birth: Leningrad, Russian SFSR, USSR [now St. Petersburg, Russia]
